text: The shop offer customised design and also ready made ayat frame according to your budget and needs. Love the quality and craftsmanship. The owner was very patient and accommodating. Those who need to have a real look and feel instead of buying online I suggest you come by his showroom. Will definitely recommend it to others.
Affordable Islamic calligraphy and products for the home. They have quite a wide range of items ranging from incense coals, prayer mats to calligraphy and metal gates.

Best islamic decor I came across so far.... Good service and product they crafted/created... Initially there are some distortion to the font of my frame and after giving them feedback, they offered to change for me to a new one. Look no more if you are looking for islamic decor for your house. This is the one!! Patient and prompt in answering queries too!! Good job!! Please continue this cust service standard and add more and more modern designs please! (:
To be able to customize my framed ayat according to my requirements is satisfying. The sales team are patient and pleasant üëçüèæ.
Professional workmanship and friendly service. Got my custom frame fix yesterday and fulfill our expectation. Alhamdulliah would recommend to others for the great commitment you all put the effort.
